price: Ɔkaa sε: “Medeε merekͻ me Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ na Ɔbεkyerε me kwan”.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
